title: #80: Discussing Brave Miss World with director Cecilia Peck
description:
The RCP team talk with Director Cecilia Peck about her award winning film documenting Miss Israel Linor Abargil's journey from being abducted, stabbed and raped in Milan Italy at the age of 18 and her fight not only to survive the rape, but also to bring the perpetrator to justice and keep him behind bars so that he can no longer harm women. This is a story that everyone should hear.


Jim and Laura profile the serial stalker, predator and rapist and the team discuss the behind the scenes of making such a powerful documentary. 


#HerNameISLinor

#IAmBrave 

#Sheroes
